parameters.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Gray pixels hum with soulful beats
E-Ink run guides our dancing feet
Royalty-free rhythms fill the air
Mentria’s grooves beyond compare

[verse 2]
Gemma 2B whispers next to Llama 3
Phi-3 Mini joins the melody
Chat the facts as the bassline flows
AI and music in sweet repose

[chorus]
Stream it live, let the melody shine
Download free, make that vibe divine
On café walls or hotel halls
Mentria’s music breaks down all walls

[verse 3]
Diffusion cores craft each funky tone
Autoencoders shape your soul’s home
One-click play, instant harmony
Embed the API for unity

[bridge]
Monochrome game meets melodic dream
Play E-Ink Run in a rhythmic stream
Fact-chat pop with rhythmic design
Privacy-first, your data’s fine

[verse 4]
Soulful pop with a future twist
Uninterrupted, you get the gist
From parlors to vlogs, the sound is free
Mentria.ai sets the music free
